ComicInfo.Summary: Supreme Apocalypse Chapter Three: Supreme Evil: Despite the best efforts of Glory and Brigade, the Baptist is able to open a portal to the realm of D'khay. Darkthornn's army emerges, led by a mind controlled Prophet and Glory goes mad with grief when she learns that he has already killed Supreme.
ComicInfo.Title: Supreme Apocalypse Chapter Three: Supreme Evil
